title: "Use IHDS to determine source of NAS and ASER discrepancies"

NAS 2017 and ASER 2018 are almost completely uncorrelated at the state level even after restricting ASER to govt schools and NAS to rural areas.  The most likely reason for this discrepancy is that NAS is administered in school while ASER is administered to a representative sample of all students.
